name: Nutty Napoleons
author: Honda
summary: A family favorite! Pecan halves sandwich and are topped with a tasty cheese mixture to form bite-sized treats that will make your guests nutty for more! This appetizer may not take over the world, but it will definitely take over your taste buds!
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Place pecan halves in a single layer on a large baking sheet
Bake in the preheated oven 7 to 10 minutes, or until browned
In a food processor, mix together cream cheese, stilton cheese, port wine, honey and pepper
Transfer to a sealable plastic bag
Arrange half the pecans on a large, flat serving dish, flat side down
Cut the tip off plastic bag
Pipe approximately 1/4 teaspoon cream cheese mixture onto each half
Top with remaining pecan halves, flat side down
Pipe another  1/4 teaspoon cream cheese mixture onto each
